name: AdaBLAS
short_description:
This contains an Ada binding to BLAS. The original source code was written by Duncan Sands and this branch uses the code from http://12000.org/my_notes/ada/lapack_and_blas/index.htm.

This exception does not however invalidate any other reasons why the executable file might be covered by the GNU Public License.
